channel.itunes:author: Buzzsprout
channel.itunes:summary: “How to Start a Podcast” is a serial podcast that teaches you how to create a podcast from scratch. Presented by Buzzsprout, this podcast is perfect for the newbie podcaster, the established podcaster who wants to make sure they have all their bases covered, or someone who wants to learn more about what it’s like to make a podcast. Start your podcast for FREE at Buzzsprout.com

channel.itunes:keywords: podcasting, how to podcast, podcast strategies, podcast tutorial

item.itunes:title: 10 Things I Wish I Knew Before I Started a Podcast
item.title: 10 Things I Wish I Knew Before I Started a Podcast
item.description:
Enjoy this bonus podcast episode where we went back through the Podcasting Q&A and 5 Minute Mondays archives to find the top 10 things we wish we knew before starting a podcast.

10 Tips (Check the Chapter Markers for time stamps)

  1. Focus on audio quality
  2. Podcast intros
  3. Ideal podcast length
  4. Go on other podcasts
  5. Guest promotion tips
  6. Use templates
  7. Format your show notes
  8. Do you need a website?
  9. Promoting on social media
  10. Batch your episodes
item.content:encoded:

item.itunes:title: The Key to Making Your Podcast Stand Out // Eric Nuzum
item.title: The Key to Making Your Podcast Stand Out // Eric Nuzum
item.description:
In this special bonus episode, Travis sits down with one of the godfathers of podcasting - Eric Nuzum.

Eric created and developed podcasts such as TED Radio Hour, Invisibilia, Fresh Air with Terry Gross, and many others and he shares that wisdom and expertise in his new book Make Noise: A Creator's Guide To Podcasting And Great Audio Storytelling.
item.content:encoded:
In this special bonus episode, Travis sits down with one of the godfathers of podcasting - Eric Nuzum.

item.itunes:title: Check out our new podcast!
item.title: Check out our new podcast!
item.description:
Buzzcast is the newest podcast from the people at Buzzsprout.

Listen on your favorite podcast app or at Buzzsprout.com

Need some help with your podcast? Join the Buzzsprout Podcast Community on Facebook to get the help you need from podcasters just like you.

item.itunes:title: #7 Launch your new podcast!
item.title: #7 Launch your new podcast!
item.description:
In this episode we cover: 

  1. How to select your podcast's "Grand Opening" date 
  2. Overcoming "launch anxiety"
  3. Strategies to promote your podcast launch


Download the “How to Start a Podcast Checklist”, a FREE, step-by-step guide designed to help you get your podcast off the ground without feeling overwhelmed. 

Start your podcast for FREE with Buzzsprout
